name: OpenClaw Vault
description: Encrypt all agent data at rest

keychainService.label: Keychain Service
keychainService.help: Name of the keychain service for storing the master key

autoMigrate.label: Auto Migrate
autoMigrate.help: Automatically migrate existing plaintext files to encrypted storage on startup

keyRotationDays.label: Key Rotation (Days)
keyRotationDays.help: Number of days before keys should be rotated

dbPath.label: Database Path
dbPath.help: Path to store the Key Management database (defaults to ~/.openclaw/vault/)

preventPlaintextStorage.label: Prevent Plaintext Storage
preventPlaintextStorage.help: When enabled, prevents storing messages and files in plaintext (encrypted only)
